description:
Thinking that he has great powers of deduction, Keroro decides to open up a detective agency.  It doesn`t go well.  And then... the return of Dororo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Artus le détective / Le retour d`un grand guerrier
Dial M for Maybe I Can Solve This Murder!
冬樹 名探偵は僕? であります / ドロロ 復活の戦士 であります
